headline: PulteGroup (PHM) Valuation Reassessed As Orders Soften And Margins Face Pressure
summary: Hilliard Isle project sets fresh context for PulteGroup stock PulteGroup (PHM) is back in focus after Pulte Homes broke ground on Hilliard Isle, a US$300 million, 900-acre master planned community in Kissimmee, adding fresh context to ongoing stock market debate. See our latest analysis for PulteGroup. The Hilliard Isle announcement lands as PulteGroup’s share price trends higher, with an 11.3% 30 day share price return and a 15.2% year to date share price return. Its 1 year total shareholder...
